original_text:
“If I have rejoiced at the ruin of him who hated me,
    or exulted when evil overtook him
korean_text: 내가 언제 나를 미워하는 자의 멸망을 기뻐하고 그가 재난을 당함으로 즐거워하였던가

sentences.original_text: If I have rejoiced at the ruin of him
or exulted when evil overtook him
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 재앙이 그에게 닥쳤을 때 즐거워하였거나
